div.p: MultiCommTerminal by Multi Comm Terminal collects the following information:

ul.li: The operating system requires certain information because the App runs as a Full Trust App. This is because the App is a Windows Desktop Application bridged to an UWP App

div.p: Multi Comm Terminal collects this information in order to provide the following benefits:

ul.li: Any data collected is done by the operating system and only to satisfy the requirements of running as a Full Trust App

div.p: Multi Comm Terminal shares this information with the following parties:

ul.li: No data outside of what is required by the operating system is collected. None is shared

div.p: This policy is subject to change without notice. Please check this page for the latest privacy policy. If you disagree with this policy, please discontinue use of the application.
